queryMap.query: SELECT /* rsm2031_s01 */ MEET_CD, -- °æÁÖ ±¸ºÐ ÄÚµå DECODE(MEET_CD,'003','°æÁ¤','°æ·û') AS MEET_NM, -- °æÁÖ ±¸ºÐ ÀÌ¸§ STND_YEAR, -- ³âµµ (STND_YEAR-1) B_STND_YEAR, -- ÀÌÀü³âµµ TMS, -- È¸Â÷ (TMS-1) B_TMS, -- ÀÌÀüÈ¸Â÷ DAY_ORD, RACE_DAY, -- °æÁÖÀÏ 'Á¦ '||TMS||'È¸Â÷ '||DAY_ORD||'ÀÏÂ÷ '|| CASE WHEN MEET_CD='001' THEN '°æ·û' WHEN MEET_CD='003' THEN '°æÁ¤' END ||'°³ÃÖ°á°úÀÚ·á('|| TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(RACE_DAY,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD')||', '|| TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(RACE_DAY,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'DY')||')' INFO, -- °æÁÖÁ¤º¸ RACE_YOIL -- ¿äÀÏ FROM VW_SDL_INFO -- °æÁÖÀÏ Á¤º¸ WHERE 1=1 AND RACE_DAY = ? -- 0:RACE_DAY °æÁÖÀÏ AND MEET_CD= ? -- 1:MEET_CD ±¸ºÐÄÚµå

SELECT /* rsm2031_s02 */ C.TOTAL C_TOTAL, -- ´©°è B.TOTAL B_TOTAL, -- ÀüÈ¸Â÷ C.TOTAL - B.TOTAL CHA, -- Áõ°¨ C.D_1, -- ÀÏ¿äÀÏ C.D_2, -- ¿ù¿äÀÏ C.D_3, -- È­¿äÀÏ C.D_4, -- ¼ö¿äÀÏ C.D_5, -- ¸ñ¿äÀÏ C.D_6, -- ±Ý¿äÀÏ C.D_7 -- Åä¿äÀÏ FROM ( SELECT SUM(POOL_TOTAL) TOTAL, SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(V.RACE_DAY,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'D')=1 THEN P.POOL_TOTAL END) D_1, SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(V.RACE_DAY,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'D')=2 THEN P.POOL_TOTAL END) D_2, SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(V.RACE_DAY,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'D')=3 THEN P.POOL_TOTAL END) D_3, SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(V.RACE_DAY,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'D')=4 THEN P.POOL_TOTAL END) D_4, SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(V.RACE_DAY,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'D')=5 THEN P.POOL_TOTAL END) D_5, SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(V.RACE_DAY,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'D')=6 THEN P.POOL_TOTAL END) D_6, SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(V.RACE_DAY,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'D')=7 THEN P.POOL_TOTAL END) D_7 FROM VW_SDL_INFO V, VW_SDL_PT P WHERE 1=1 AND V.MEET_CD = ? -- 0:MEET_CD °æ·û °æÁ¤ ±¸ºÐ ÄÚµå AND V.STND_YEAR = ? -- 1:STND_YEAR ±âÁØ³âµµ AND V.TMS = ? -- 2:TMS È¸Â÷ AND P.MEET_CD=V.MEET_CD AND P.STND_YEAR=V.STND_YEAR AND P.TMS=V.TMS AND P.DAY_ORD=V.DAY_ORD ) C, ( SELECT SUM(POOL_TOTAL) TOTAL FROM VW_SDL_PT WHERE 1=1 AND MEET_CD = ? -- 3:MEET_CD °æ·û °æÁ¤ ±¸ºÐ ÄÚµå AND STND_YEAR = ? -- 4:STND_YEAR ±âÁØ³âµµ AND TMS = ? -1 -- 5:TMS È¸Â÷ ) B

SELECT /* rsm2031_s03 */ C.MEET_CD, -- °æ·û °æÁ¤ ±¸ºÐ ÄÚµå C.TMS, -- È¸Â÷ C.DAY_ORD, -- ÀÏÂ÷ C.RACE_NO, -- °æÁÖ FC_GET_RSLT_RANK(C.STND_YEAR,C.MEET_CD,C.TMS,C.DAY_ORD,C.RACE_NO) RS_RANK, -- Âø¼ø
RUNNER_1ST_001, -- ´Ü½Â Âø¼ø '('||RUNNER_1ST_001||')' AS RUNNER_1ST_001_DESC, -- ´Ü½Â Âø¼ø Ç¥Çö DECODE(R.PAYOFF_001,NULL,'-',R.PAYOFF_001) PAYOFF_001, -- ´Ü½Â DECODE(R.PAYOFF_001,NULL,'-',R.PAYOFF_001) AS PAYOFF_001_DESC, -- ´Ü½Â Ç¥Çö
RUNNER_1ST_002_1, -- ¿¬½Â Âø¼ø 1 '('||RUNNER_1ST_002_1||')' AS RUNNER_1ST_002_1_DESC, -- ¿¬½Â Âø¼ø 1 Ç¥Çö DECODE(R.PAYOFF_002_1,NULL,'-',R.PAYOFF_002_1) PAYOFF_002_1, -- ¿¬½Â 1 DECODE(R.PAYOFF_002_1,NULL,'-',R.PAYOFF_002_1) AS PAYOFF_002_1_DESC, -- ¿¬½Â 1 Ç¥Çö
RUNNER_1ST_002_2, -- ¿¬½Â Âø¼ø 2 '('||RUNNER_1ST_002_2||')' AS RUNNER_1ST_002_2_DESC, -- ¿¬½Â Âø¼ø 2 Ç¥Çö DECODE(R.PAYOFF_002_2,NULL,'-',R.PAYOFF_002_2) PAYOFF_002_2, -- ¿¬½Â 2 DECODE(R.PAYOFF_002_2,NULL,'-',R.PAYOFF_002_2) AS PAYOFF_002_2_DESC, -- ¿¬½Â 2 Ç¥Çö
RUNNER_1ST_004, -- ½Ö½Â Âø¼ø 1 RUNNER_2ND_004, -- ½Ö½Â Âø¼ø 2 '('||RUNNER_1ST_004||'-'||RUNNER_2ND_004||')' AS RUNNER_004_DESC, -- ½Ö½Â Âø¼ø Ç¥Çö DECODE(R.PAYOFF_004,NULL,'-',R.PAYOFF_004) PAYOFF_004, -- ½Ö½Â DECODE(R.PAYOFF_004,NULL,'-',R.PAYOFF_004) AS PAYOFF_004_DESC, -- ½Ö½Â Ç¥Çö
RUNNER_1ST_005, -- º¹½Â Âø¼ø 1 RUNNER_2ND_005, -- º¹½Â Âø¼ø 2 '('||RUNNER_1ST_005||'-'||RUNNER_2ND_005||')' AS RUNNER_005_DESC, -- º¹½Â Âø¼ø Ç¥Çö DECODE(R.PAYOFF_005,NULL,'-',R.PAYOFF_005) PAYOFF_005, -- º¹½Â DECODE(R.PAYOFF_005,NULL,'-',R.PAYOFF_005) AS PAYOFF_005_DESC, -- º¹½Â Ç¥Çö
RUNNER_1ST_006_1, -- »ïº¹½Â Âø¼ø 1-1 RUNNER_2ND_006_1, -- »ïº¹½Â Âø¼ø 1-2 RUNNER_3RD_006_1, -- »ïº¹½Â Âø¼ø 1-3
'('||RUNNER_1ST_006_1||'-'||RUNNER_2ND_006_1||'-'||RUNNER_3RD_006_1||')' AS RUNNER_006_1_DESC, -- »ïº¹½Â 1 Âø¼ø Ç¥Çö DECODE(R.PAYOFF_006_1,NULL,'-',R.PAYOFF_006_1) AS PAYOFF_006_1, -- »ïº¹ 1 DECODE(R.PAYOFF_006_1,NULL,'-',R.PAYOFF_006_1) AS PAYOFF_006_1_DESC, -- »ïº¹ 1 Ç¥Çö
C.TOT, -- °è C.BONGJANG, -- º»Àå C.JIJUM, -- ÁöÁ¡ NVL(B.TOT,0) AS B_TOT, -- ÀüÈ¸Â÷ NVL(Y.TOT,0) AS Y_TOT, -- Àü³â ROUND( CASE WHEN B.TOT>0 THEN (C.TOT-B.TOT)/B.TOT*100 ELSE 0 END ,2) B_PLUS_MINUS, -- Áõ°¨À² ROUND( CASE WHEN Y.TOT>0 THEN (C.TOT-Y.TOT)/Y.TOT*100 ELSE 0 END ,2) AS Y_PLUS_MINUS, -- Àü³â Áõ°¨À² SAME_PAYOFF_TOTAL, -- µ¿Âø Á¸Àç ¿©ºÎ SAME_PAYOFF_001, -- ´Ü½Â µ¿Âø SAME_PAYOFF_002, -- ¿¬½Â µ¿Âø SAME_PAYOFF_004, -- ½Ö½Â µ¿Âø SAME_PAYOFF_005, -- º¹½Â µ¿Âø SAME_PAYOFF_006 -- »ïº¹½Â µ¿Âø FROM ( SELECT D.STND_YEAR, D.MEET_CD, D.TMS, D.DAY_ORD, D.RACE_NO, SUM(D.DIV_TOTAL) TOT,
SUM( CASE WHEN D.MEET_CD='001' AND D.SELL_CD = '01' AND D.COMM_NO IN ('01','02','03','04','08') THEN D.DIV_TOTAL WHEN D.MEET_CD='003' AND D.SELL_CD = '03' AND D.COMM_NO IN ('01','02','03','04','08') THEN D.DIV_TOTAL END ) AS BONGJANG,
SUM(CASE WHEN SELL_CD NOT IN('01','03') OR COMM_NO NOT IN ('01','02','03','04','08') THEN D.DIV_TOTAL END) JIJUM FROM VW_SDL_DT D WHERE 1=1 AND D.MEET_CD = ? -- 0:MEET_CD °æ·û:001 ,°æÁ¤:003 AND D.STND_YEAR = ? -- 1:STND_YEAR ±âÁØ³âµµ AND D.TMS = ? -- 2:TMS È¸Â÷ AND D.DAY_ORD = ? -- 3:DAY_ORD ÀÏÂ÷ GROUP BY D.STND_YEAR, D.MEET_CD, D.TMS, D.DAY_ORD, D.RACE_NO
)C, ( SELECT D.MEET_CD, D.TMS, D.DAY_ORD, D.RACE_NO, SUM(D.DIV_TOTAL) TOT FROM VW_SDL_DT D WHERE 1=1 AND D.MEET_CD = ? -- 4:MEET_CD °æ·û:001 ,°æÁ¤:003 AND D.STND_YEAR = ? -- 5:STND_YEAR ±âÁØ³âµµ AND D.TMS = ? -1 -- 6:TMS È¸Â÷ AND D.DAY_ORD = ? -- 7:DAY_ORD ÀÏÂ÷ GROUP BY D.MEET_CD, D.TMS, D.DAY_ORD, D.RACE_NO )B, ( SELECT D.MEET_CD, D.TMS, D.DAY_ORD, DECODE(D.RACE_NO,NULL,'TOTAL',D.RACE_NO) RACE_NO, SUM(D.DIV_TOTAL) TOT FROM VW_SDL_DT D WHERE 1=1 AND D.MEET_CD = ? -- 8:MEET_CD °æ·û:001 ,°æÁ¤:003 AND D.STND_YEAR = ? -1 -- 9:STND_YEAR ±âÁØ³âµµ AND D.TMS = ? -- 10:TMS È¸Â÷ AND D.DAY_ORD = ? -- 11:DAY_ORD ÀÏÂ÷ GROUP BY D.MEET_CD, D.TMS, D.DAY_ORD, D.RACE_NO ) Y, ( SELECT DECODE(RACE_NO,NULL,'TOTAL',RACE_NO) RACE_NO,
AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '001' THEN RUNNER_1ST END) AS RUNNER_1ST_001, -- ´Ü½Â Âø¼ø
AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '002' AND RS_SEQ='1' THEN RUNNER_1ST END) AS RUNNER_1ST_002_1, -- ¿¬½Â Âø¼ø 1 AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '002' AND RS_SEQ='2' THEN RUNNER_1ST END) AS RUNNER_1ST_002_2, -- ¿¬½Â Âø¼ø 2
AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '004' THEN RUNNER_1ST END) RUNNER_1ST_004, -- ½Ö½Â Âø¼ø 1 AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '004' THEN RUNNER_2ND END) RUNNER_2ND_004, -- ½Ö½Â Âø¼ø 2
AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '005' THEN RUNNER_1ST END) RUNNER_1ST_005, -- º¹½Â Âø¼ø 1 AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '005' THEN RUNNER_2ND END) RUNNER_2ND_005, -- º¹½Â Âø¼ø 2
AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '006' AND RS_SEQ='1' THEN RUNNER_1ST END) RUNNER_1ST_006_1, -- »ïº¹½Â Âø¼ø 1-1 AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '006' AND RS_SEQ='1' THEN RUNNER_2ND END) RUNNER_2ND_006_1, -- »ïº¹½Â Âø¼ø 1-2 AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '006' AND RS_SEQ='1' THEN RUNNER_3RD END) RUNNER_3RD_006_1, -- »ïº¹½Â Âø¼ø 1-3
AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '006' AND RS_SEQ='2' THEN RUNNER_1ST END) RUNNER_1ST_006_2, -- »ïº¹½Â Âø¼ø 2-1 AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '006' AND RS_SEQ='2' THEN RUNNER_2ND END) RUNNER_2ND_006_2, -- »ïº¹½Â Âø¼ø 2-2 AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '006' AND RS_SEQ='2' THEN RUNNER_3RD END) RUNNER_3RD_006_2, -- »ïº¹½Â Âø¼ø 2-3
ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '001' THEN PAYOFF END),2) PAYOFF_001, ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '002' AND RS_SEQ='1' THEN PAYOFF END),2) PAYOFF_002_1, ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '002' AND RS_SEQ='2' THEN PAYOFF END),2) PAYOFF_002_2, ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '004' THEN PAYOFF END),2) PAYOFF_004, ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '005' THEN PAYOFF END),2) PAYOFF_005, ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '006' THEN PAYOFF END),2) PAYOFF_006_1,
SUM(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '001' AND RS_SEQ >= '2' THEN PAYOFF WHEN POOL_CD = '002' AND RS_SEQ >= '3' THEN PAYOFF WHEN POOL_CD = '004' AND RS_SEQ >= '2' THEN PAYOFF WHEN POOL_CD = '005' AND RS_SEQ >= '2' THEN PAYOFF WHEN POOL_CD = '006' AND RS_SEQ >= '2' THEN PAYOFF END) AS SAME_PAYOFF_TOTAL, -- µ¿Âø Á¸Àç ¿©ºÎ È®ÀÎ
SUM(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '001' AND RS_SEQ >= '2' THEN PAYOFF END) AS SAME_PAYOFF_001, -- ´Ü½Â µ¿Âø SUM(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '002' AND RS_SEQ >= '3' THEN PAYOFF END) AS SAME_PAYOFF_002, -- ¿¬½Â µ¿Âø SUM(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '004' AND RS_SEQ >= '2' THEN PAYOFF END) AS SAME_PAYOFF_004, -- ½Ö½Â µ¿Âø SUM(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '005' AND RS_SEQ >= '2' THEN PAYOFF END) AS SAME_PAYOFF_005, -- º¹½Â µ¿Âø SUM(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '006' AND RS_SEQ >= '2' THEN PAYOFF END) AS SAME_PAYOFF_006 -- »ïº¹½Â µ¿Âø
FROM TBES_SDL_RS WHERE 1=1 AND MEET_CD = ? -- 12:MEET_CD °æ·û:001 ,°æÁ¤:003 AND STND_YEAR = ? -- 13:STND_YEAR ±âÁØ³âµµ AND TMS = ? -- 14:TMS È¸Â÷ AND DAY_ORD = ? -- 15:DAY_ORD ÀÏÂ÷ GROUP BY RACE_NO -- ROLLUP(RACE_NO) -- ÃÖÁ¾ ·¹ÄÚµåÀÇ TOTAL, SUM »ý¼º¿ë ) R WHERE 1=1 AND C.RACE_NO=B.RACE_NO(+) AND C.RACE_NO=Y.RACE_NO(+) AND C.RACE_NO=R.RACE_NO(+) ORDER BY C.RACE_NO

SELECT /* rsm2031_select03 */ C.MEET_CD, -- °æ·û °æÁ¤ ±¸ºÐ ÄÚµå C.TMS, -- È¸Â÷ C.DAY_ORD, -- ÀÏÂ÷ Z.RACE_NO, -- °æÁÖ FC_GET_RSLT_RANK(C.STND_YEAR,C.MEET_CD,C.TMS,C.DAY_ORD,C.RACE_NO) RS_RANK, -- Âø¼ø
RUNNER_1ST_001, -- ´Ü½Â Âø¼ø '('||RUNNER_1ST_001||')' AS RUNNER_1ST_001_DESC, -- ´Ü½Â Âø¼ø Ç¥Çö DECODE(R.PAYOFF_001,NULL,'-',R.PAYOFF_001) PAYOFF_001, -- ´Ü½Â DECODE(R.PAYOFF_001,NULL,'-',R.PAYOFF_001) AS PAYOFF_001_DESC, -- ´Ü½Â Ç¥Çö
RUNNER_1ST_002_1, -- ¿¬½Â Âø¼ø 1 '('||RUNNER_1ST_002_1||')' AS RUNNER_1ST_002_1_DESC, -- ¿¬½Â Âø¼ø 1 Ç¥Çö DECODE(R.PAYOFF_002_1,NULL,'-',R.PAYOFF_002_1) PAYOFF_002_1, -- ¿¬½Â 1 DECODE(R.PAYOFF_002_1,NULL,'-',R.PAYOFF_002_1) AS PAYOFF_002_1_DESC, -- ¿¬½Â 1 Ç¥Çö
RUNNER_1ST_002_2, -- ¿¬½Â Âø¼ø 2 '('||RUNNER_1ST_002_2||')' AS RUNNER_1ST_002_2_DESC, -- ¿¬½Â Âø¼ø 2 Ç¥Çö DECODE(R.PAYOFF_002_2,NULL,'-',R.PAYOFF_002_2) PAYOFF_002_2, -- ¿¬½Â 2 DECODE(R.PAYOFF_002_2,NULL,'-',R.PAYOFF_002_2) AS PAYOFF_002_2_DESC, -- ¿¬½Â 2 Ç¥Çö
RUNNER_1ST_002_3, -- ¿¬½Â Âø¼ø 2 '('||RUNNER_1ST_002_3||')' AS RUNNER_1ST_002_3_DESC, -- ¿¬½Â Âø¼ø 2 Ç¥Çö DECODE(R.PAYOFF_002_3,NULL,'-',R.PAYOFF_002_3) PAYOFF_002_3, -- ¿¬½Â 2 DECODE(R.PAYOFF_002_3,NULL,'-',R.PAYOFF_002_3) AS PAYOFF_002_3_DESC, -- ¿¬½Â 2 Ç¥Çö
RUNNER_1ST_004, -- ½Ö½Â Âø¼ø 1 RUNNER_2ND_004, -- ½Ö½Â Âø¼ø 2 '('||RUNNER_1ST_004||'-'||RUNNER_2ND_004||')' AS RUNNER_004_DESC, -- ½Ö½Â Âø¼ø Ç¥Çö DECODE(R.PAYOFF_004,NULL,'-',R.PAYOFF_004) PAYOFF_004, -- ½Ö½Â DECODE(R.PAYOFF_004,NULL,'-',R.PAYOFF_004) AS PAYOFF_004_DESC, -- ½Ö½Â Ç¥Çö
RUNNER_1ST_005, -- º¹½Â Âø¼ø 1 RUNNER_2ND_005, -- º¹½Â Âø¼ø 2 '('||RUNNER_1ST_005||'-'||RUNNER_2ND_005||')' AS RUNNER_005_DESC, -- º¹½Â Âø¼ø Ç¥Çö DECODE(R.PAYOFF_005,NULL,'-',R.PAYOFF_005) PAYOFF_005, -- º¹½Â DECODE(R.PAYOFF_005,NULL,'-',R.PAYOFF_005) AS PAYOFF_005_DESC, -- º¹½Â Ç¥Çö
RUNNER_1ST_006_1, -- »ïº¹½Â Âø¼ø 1-1 RUNNER_2ND_006_1, -- »ïº¹½Â Âø¼ø 1-2 RUNNER_3RD_006_1, -- »ïº¹½Â Âø¼ø 1-3
'('||RUNNER_1ST_006_1||'-'||RUNNER_2ND_006_1||'-'||RUNNER_3RD_006_1||')' AS RUNNER_006_1_DESC, -- »ïº¹½Â 1 Âø¼ø Ç¥Çö DECODE(R.PAYOFF_006_1,NULL,'-',R.PAYOFF_006_1) AS PAYOFF_006_1, -- »ïº¹ 1 DECODE(R.PAYOFF_006_1,NULL,'-',R.PAYOFF_006_1) AS PAYOFF_006_1_DESC, -- »ïº¹ 1 Ç¥Çö
C.TOT, -- °è C.BONGJANG, -- º»Àå C.JIJUM, -- ÁöÁ¡ B.TOT B_TOT, -- ÀüÈ¸Â÷ Y.TOT Y_TOT, -- Àü³â ROUND( CASE WHEN B.TOT>0 THEN (C.TOT-B.TOT)/B.TOT*100 ELSE 0 END ,2) B_PLUS_MINUS, -- Áõ°¨À² ROUND( CASE WHEN Y.TOT>0 THEN (C.TOT-Y.TOT)/Y.TOT*100 ELSE 0 END ,2) AS Y_PLUS_MINUS, -- Àü³â Áõ°¨À² SAME_PAYOFF_TOTAL, -- µ¿Âø Á¸Àç ¿©ºÎ SAME_PAYOFF_001, -- ´Ü½Â µ¿Âø SAME_PAYOFF_002, -- ¿¬½Â µ¿Âø SAME_PAYOFF_004, -- ½Ö½Â µ¿Âø SAME_PAYOFF_005, -- º¹½Â µ¿Âø SAME_PAYOFF_006 -- »ïº¹½Â µ¿Âø

/* rsm2031_from01 °æÁÖº° ÇöÈ² */ FROM ( SELECT D.STND_YEAR, D.MEET_CD, D.TMS, D.DAY_ORD, DECODE(D.RACE_NO,NULL,'TOTAL',D.RACE_NO) RACE_NO, SUM(D.DIV_TOTAL) TOT,
SUM( CASE WHEN D.MEET_CD='001' AND D.SELL_CD = '01' AND D.COMM_NO IN ('01','02','03','04','08') THEN D.DIV_TOTAL WHEN D.MEET_CD='003' AND D.SELL_CD = '03' AND D.COMM_NO IN ('01','02','03','04','08') THEN D.DIV_TOTAL END ) AS BONGJANG,
--SUM(CASE WHEN SELL_CD NOT IN('01','03') OR COMM_NO NOT IN ('01','02','03','04','08') THEN D.DIV_TOTAL END) JIJUM SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(MEET_CD,2,2) = SELL_CD AND COMM_NO IN ('01','02','03','04','08') THEN 0 ELSE D.DIV_TOTAL END) JIJUM FROM VW_SDL_DT D WHERE 1=1 AND D.MEET_CD = ? -- 0:MEET_CD °æ·û:001 ,°æÁ¤:003 AND D.STND_YEAR = ? -- 1:STND_YEAR ±âÁØ³âµµ AND D.TMS = ? -- 2:TMS È¸Â÷ AND D.DAY_ORD = ? -- 3:DAY_ORD ÀÏÂ÷ GROUP BY D.STND_YEAR, D.MEET_CD, D.TMS, D.DAY_ORD, D.RACE_NO -- ROLLUP(D.RACE_NO) -- ÃÖÁ¾ ·¹ÄÚµåÀÇ TOTAL, SUM »ý¼º¿ë
ORDER BY D.RACE_NO ) C, ( SELECT D.MEET_CD, D.TMS, D.DAY_ORD, DECODE(D.RACE_NO,NULL,'TOTAL',D.RACE_NO) RACE_NO, SUM(D.DIV_TOTAL) TOT, I.RACE_YOIL FROM VW_SDL_DT D, VW_SDL_INFO I WHERE 1=1 AND D.MEET_CD = ? -- 4:MEET_CD °æ·û:001 ,°æÁ¤:003 AND D.STND_YEAR = ? -- 5:STND_YEAR ±âÁØ³âµµ AND D.TMS = ? -1 -- 6:TMS È¸Â÷ AND D.MEET_CD = I.MEET_CD AND D.STND_YEAR = I.STND_YEAR AND D.TMS = I.TMS AND D.DAY_ORD = I.DAY_ORD AND I.RACE_YOIL = ? -- 7:RACE_YOIL ¿äÀÏ GROUP BY D.MEET_CD, D.TMS, D.DAY_ORD, D.RACE_NO, I.RACE_YOIL -- ROLLUP(D.RACE_NO) -- ÃÖÁ¾ ·¹ÄÚµåÀÇ TOTAL, SUM »ý¼º¿ë ORDER BY D.RACE_NO ) B, ( SELECT D.MEET_CD, D.TMS, D.DAY_ORD, DECODE(D.RACE_NO,NULL,'TOTAL',D.RACE_NO) RACE_NO, SUM(D.DIV_TOTAL) TOT, I.RACE_YOIL FROM VW_SDL_DT D, VW_SDL_INFO I WHERE 1=1 AND D.MEET_CD = ? -- 8:MEET_CD °æ·û:001 ,°æÁ¤:003 AND D.STND_YEAR = ?-1 -- 9:STND_YEAR ±âÁØ³âµµ AND D.TMS = ? -- 10:TMS È¸Â÷ AND D.MEET_CD = I.MEET_CD AND D.STND_YEAR = I.STND_YEAR AND D.TMS = I.TMS AND D.DAY_ORD = I.DAY_ORD AND I.RACE_YOIL = ? -- 11:RACE_YOIL ¿äÀÏ GROUP BY D.MEET_CD, D.TMS, D.DAY_ORD, D.RACE_NO, I.RACE_YOIL -- ROLLUP(D.RACE_NO) -- ÃÖÁ¾ ·¹ÄÚµåÀÇ TOTAL, SUM »ý¼º¿ë ORDER BY D.RACE_NO ) Y, ( SELECT DECODE(R.RACE_NO,NULL,'TOTAL',R.RACE_NO) RACE_NO,
AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '001' THEN RUNNER_1ST END) AS RUNNER_1ST_001, -- ´Ü½Â Âø¼ø
AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '002' AND RS_SEQ='1' THEN RUNNER_1ST END) AS RUNNER_1ST_002_1, -- ¿¬½Â Âø¼ø 1 AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '002' AND RS_SEQ='2' THEN RUNNER_1ST END) AS RUNNER_1ST_002_2, -- ¿¬½Â Âø¼ø 2 AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '002' AND RS_SEQ='3' THEN RUNNER_1ST END) AS RUNNER_1ST_002_3, -- ¿¬½Â Âø¼ø 2
AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '004' THEN RUNNER_1ST END) RUNNER_1ST_004, -- ½Ö½Â Âø¼ø 1 AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '004' THEN RUNNER_2ND END) RUNNER_2ND_004, -- ½Ö½Â Âø¼ø 2
AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '005' THEN RUNNER_1ST END) RUNNER_1ST_005, -- º¹½Â Âø¼ø 1 AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '005' THEN RUNNER_2ND END) RUNNER_2ND_005, -- º¹½Â Âø¼ø 2
AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '006' AND RS_SEQ='1' THEN RUNNER_1ST END) RUNNER_1ST_006_1, -- »ïº¹½Â Âø¼ø 1-1 AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '006' AND RS_SEQ='1' THEN RUNNER_2ND END) RUNNER_2ND_006_1, -- »ïº¹½Â Âø¼ø 1-2 AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '006' AND RS_SEQ='1' THEN RUNNER_3RD END) RUNNER_3RD_006_1, -- »ïº¹½Â Âø¼ø 1-3
AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '006' AND RS_SEQ='2' THEN RUNNER_1ST END) RUNNER_1ST_006_2, -- »ïº¹½Â Âø¼ø 2-1 AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '006' AND RS_SEQ='2' THEN RUNNER_2ND END) RUNNER_2ND_006_2, -- »ïº¹½Â Âø¼ø 2-2 AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '006' AND RS_SEQ='2' THEN RUNNER_3RD END) RUNNER_3RD_006_2, -- »ïº¹½Â Âø¼ø 2-3
ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '001' THEN PAYOFF END),2) PAYOFF_001, ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '002' AND RS_SEQ='1' THEN PAYOFF END),2) PAYOFF_002_1, ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '002' AND RS_SEQ='2' THEN PAYOFF END),2) PAYOFF_002_2, ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '002' AND RS_SEQ='3' THEN PAYOFF END),2) PAYOFF_002_3, ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '004' THEN PAYOFF END),2) PAYOFF_004, ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '005' THEN PAYOFF END),2) PAYOFF_005, ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '006' THEN PAYOFF END),2) PAYOFF_006_1,
SUM(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '001' AND RS_SEQ >= '2' THEN PAYOFF WHEN POOL_CD = '002' AND RS_SEQ >= '3' AND NVL(O.CNT,7) = 7 THEN PAYOFF WHEN POOL_CD = '002' AND RS_SEQ >= '4' AND NVL(O.CNT,7) = 8 THEN PAYOFF WHEN POOL_CD = '004' AND RS_SEQ >= '2' THEN PAYOFF WHEN POOL_CD = '005' AND RS_SEQ >= '2' THEN PAYOFF WHEN POOL_CD = '006' AND RS_SEQ >= '2' THEN PAYOFF END) AS SAME_PAYOFF_TOTAL, -- µ¿Âø Á¸Àç ¿©ºÎ È®ÀÎ
SUM(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '001' AND RS_SEQ >= '2' THEN PAYOFF END) AS SAME_PAYOFF_001, -- ´Ü½Â µ¿Âø SUM(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '002' AND RS_SEQ >= '3' AND NVL(O.CNT,7) = 7 THEN PAYOFF WHEN POOL_CD = '002' AND RS_SEQ >= '4' AND NVL(O.CNT,7) = 8 THEN PAYOFF END) AS SAME_PAYOFF_002, -- ¿¬½Â µ¿Âø SUM(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '004' AND RS_SEQ >= '2' THEN PAYOFF END) AS SAME_PAYOFF_004, -- ½Ö½Â µ¿Âø SUM(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '005' AND RS_SEQ >= '2' THEN PAYOFF END) AS SAME_PAYOFF_005, -- º¹½Â µ¿Âø SUM(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '006' AND RS_SEQ >= '2' THEN PAYOFF END) AS SAME_PAYOFF_006 -- »ïº¹½Â µ¿Âø
FROM TBES_SDL_RS R, (SELECT MEET_CD, STND_YEAR, TMS, DAY_ORD, RACE_NO, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM US_CRA.TBJB_CFM_ORGAN GROUP BY MEET_CD, STND_YEAR, TMS, DAY_ORD, RACE_NO) O WHERE 1=1 AND R.MEET_CD = ? -- 12:MEET_CD °æ·û:001 ,°æÁ¤:003 AND R.STND_YEAR = ? -- 13:STND_YEAR ±âÁØ³âµµ AND R.TMS = ? -- 14:TMS È¸Â÷ AND R.DAY_ORD = ? -- 15:DAY_ORD ÀÏÂ÷ AND R.STATUS = 'N' AND R.STND_YEAR = O.STND_YEAR(+) AND R.MEET_CD = O.MEET_CD(+) AND R.TMS = O.TMS(+) AND R.DAY_ORD = O.DAY_ORD(+) AND R.RACE_NO = O.RACE_NO(+) GROUP BY R.RACE_NO -- ROLLUP(RACE_NO) -- ÃÖÁ¾ ·¹ÄÚµåÀÇ TOTAL, SUM »ý¼º¿ë ) R,

SELECT /* rsm2031_s06 */ NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN R.TMS=DU.TMS THEN E.ENT_PRSN_NUM END),0) AS TOT_INWON, -- ±ÝÈ¸ ÀüÃ¼ NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN R.TMS=DU.B_TMS THEN E.ENT_PRSN_NUM END),0) AS B_TOT_INWON, -- ÀüÈ¸ ÀüÃ¼ NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN R.TMS=DU.TMS AND R.MEET_CD||E.BRNC_CD IN ('00100', '00398') THEN E.ENT_PRSN_NUM END),0) AS BONG_INWON, -- º»Àå ±ÝÈ¸ NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN R.TMS=DU.B_TMS AND R.MEET_CD||E.BRNC_CD IN ('00100', '00398') THEN E.ENT_PRSN_NUM END),0) AS B_BONG_INWON, -- º»Àå ÀüÈ¸ NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN R.TMS=DU.TMS AND R.MEET_CD||E.BRNC_CD NOT IN ('00100', '00398') THEN E.ENT_PRSN_NUM END),0) AS JIJUM_INWON, -- ÁöÁ¡ ±ÝÈ¸ NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN R.TMS=DU.B_TMS AND R.MEET_CD||E.BRNC_CD NOT IN ('00100', '00398') THEN E.ENT_PRSN_NUM END),0) AS B_JIJUM_INWON -- ÁöÁ¡ ÀüÈ¸ FROM VW_SDL_INFO R -- °æÁÖÀÏ Á¤º¸ ,TBRC_STAY_MANA E, -- Ã¼·ùÀÎ¿ø°ü¸® TBRK_SPEC_CD C, (SELECT ? AS TMS,(? -1) AS B_TMS FROM DUAL)DU -- 0:TMS ,1:TMS WHERE 1=1 AND R.MEET_CD = E.MEET_CD AND R.RACE_DAY = E.RACE_DT AND E.BRNC_CD = C.CD AND C.GRP_CD IN ('018','032') AND R.MEET_CD = ? -- 2:MEET_CD AND R.STND_YEAR = ? -- 3:STND_YEAR '2009' AND R.TMS IN (?,(?-1)) -- 4:TMS '2',5:TMS AND R.RACE_YOIL = ? -- 6:RACE_YOIL '2'

SELECT /* rsm2031_s07 */ MEET_CD, -- °æ·û °æÁ¤ ±¸ºÐ ÄÚµå STND_YEAR, -- ±âÁØ³âµµ TMS, -- È¸Â÷ DAY_ORD, -- ÀÏÂ÷ SPEC_DESC -- Æ¯ÀÌ»çÇ× ³»¿ë FROM TBRD_RACE_SPEC_DESC WHERE 1=1 AND MEET_CD = ? -- 0:MEET_CD °æ·û °æÁ¤ ±¸ºÐ ÄÚµå AND STND_YEAR = ? -- 1:STND_YEAR ±âÁØ³âµµ AND TMS = ? -- 2:TMS È¸Â÷ AND DAY_ORD = ? -- 3:DAY_ORD ÀÏÂ÷

SELECT /* rsm2031_s08 */ B.RACE_YOIL -- ¿äÀÏ FROM VW_SDL_INFO B WHERE 1=1 AND B.MEET_CD = ? -- 0:MEET_CD:°³ÃÖÁö ÄÚµå AND B.STND_YEAR = ? -- 1:STND_YEAR:±âÁØ³âµµ AND B.TMS = ? -- 2:TMS ½ÃÀÛ ÀÏ
GROUP BY RACE_YOIL

SELECT /* rsm2031_s09 */ RACE_NO, -- °æÁÖ¹øÈ£ POOL_CD, -- ½Â½Ä ÄÚµå CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '001' THEN '´Ü½Â½Ä' WHEN POOL_CD = '002' THEN '¿¬½Â½Ä' WHEN POOL_CD = '004' THEN '½Ö½Â½Ä' WHEN POOL_CD = '005' THEN 'º¹½Â½Ä' WHEN POOL_CD = '006' THEN '»ïº¹½Â½Ä' END AS POOL_NM, -- ½Â½Ä ÀÌ¸§ RS_SEQ, -- Âø¼ø RUNNER_1ST, -- ¼±ÅÃ 1 RUNNER_2ND, -- ¼±ÅÃ 2 RUNNER_3RD, -- ¼±ÅÃ 3 RUNNER_1ST||DECODE(RUNNER_2ND,'0','','-'||RUNNER_2ND)||DECODE(RUNNER_3RD,'0','','-'||RUNNER_3RD) AS RUNNER_RESULT, -- ½ÂÀÚ PAYOFF, -- È®Á¤ ¹è´ç·ü STATUS -- ¹è´ç Á¾·ù FROM TBES_SDL_RS WHERE 1=1 AND MEET_CD = ? -- 0:MEET_CD °æ·û:001 ,°æÁ¤:003 AND STND_YEAR = ? -- 1:STND_YEAR ±âÁØ³âµµ AND TMS = ? -- 2:TMS È¸Â÷ AND DAY_ORD = ? -- 3:DAY_ORD ÀÏÂ÷ AND RACE_NO = ? -- 4:RACE_NO °æÁÖ¹øÈ£ ORDER BY RACE_NO,POOL_CD,RS_SEQ

SELECT /* rsm2031_s02Today */ C.TOTAL C_TOTAL, -- ´©°è B.TOTAL B_TOTAL, -- ÀüÈ¸Â÷ C.TOTAL - B.TOTAL CHA, -- Áõ°¨ C.D_1, -- ÀÏ¿äÀÏ C.D_2, -- ¿ù¿äÀÏ C.D_3, -- È­¿äÀÏ C.D_4, -- ¼ö¿äÀÏ C.D_5, -- ¸ñ¿äÀÏ C.D_6, -- ±Ý¿äÀÏ C.D_7 -- Åä¿äÀÏ FROM ( SELECT SUM(POOL_TOTAL) TOTAL, SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(V.RACE_DAY,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'D')=1 THEN P.POOL_TOTAL END) D_1, SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(V.RACE_DAY,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'D')=2 THEN P.POOL_TOTAL END) D_2, SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(V.RACE_DAY,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'D')=3 THEN P.POOL_TOTAL END) D_3, SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(V.RACE_DAY,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'D')=4 THEN P.POOL_TOTAL END) D_4, SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(V.RACE_DAY,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'D')=5 THEN P.POOL_TOTAL END) D_5, SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(V.RACE_DAY,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'D')=6 THEN P.POOL_TOTAL END) D_6, SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(V.RACE_DAY,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'D')=7 THEN P.POOL_TOTAL END) D_7 FROM VW_SDL_INFO V, TBES_SDL_PT P WHERE 1=1 AND V.MEET_CD = ? -- 0:MEET_CD °æ·û °æÁ¤ ±¸ºÐ ÄÚµå AND V.STND_YEAR = ? -- 1:STND_YEAR ±âÁØ³âµµ AND V.TMS = ? -- 2:TMS È¸Â÷ AND P.MEET_CD=V.MEET_CD AND P.STND_YEAR=V.STND_YEAR AND P.TMS=V.TMS AND P.DAY_ORD=V.DAY_ORD ) C, ( SELECT SUM(POOL_TOTAL) TOTAL FROM TBES_SDL_PT WHERE 1=1 AND MEET_CD = ? -- 3:MEET_CD °æ·û °æÁ¤ ±¸ºÐ ÄÚµå AND STND_YEAR = ? -- 4:STND_YEAR ±âÁØ³âµµ AND TMS = ?-1 -- 5:TMS È¸Â÷ ) B

SELECT /* rsm2031_s03Today */ C.MEET_CD, -- °æ·û °æÁ¤ ±¸ºÐ ÄÚµå C.TMS, -- È¸Â÷ C.DAY_ORD, -- ÀÏÂ÷ C.RACE_NO, -- °æÁÖ FC_GET_RSLT_RANK(C.STND_YEAR,C.MEET_CD,C.TMS,C.DAY_ORD,C.RACE_NO) RS_RANK, -- Âø¼ø
RUNNER_1ST_001, -- ´Ü½Â Âø¼ø '('||RUNNER_1ST_001||')' AS RUNNER_1ST_001_DESC, -- ´Ü½Â Âø¼ø Ç¥Çö DECODE(R.PAYOFF_001,NULL,'-',R.PAYOFF_001) PAYOFF_001, -- ´Ü½Â DECODE(R.PAYOFF_001,NULL,'-',R.PAYOFF_001) AS PAYOFF_001_DESC, -- ´Ü½Â Ç¥Çö
RUNNER_1ST_002_1, -- ¿¬½Â Âø¼ø 1 '('||RUNNER_1ST_002_1||')' AS RUNNER_1ST_002_1_DESC, -- ¿¬½Â Âø¼ø 1 Ç¥Çö DECODE(R.PAYOFF_002_1,NULL,'-',R.PAYOFF_002_1) PAYOFF_002_1, -- ¿¬½Â 1 DECODE(R.PAYOFF_002_1,NULL,'-',R.PAYOFF_002_1) AS PAYOFF_002_1_DESC, -- ¿¬½Â 1 Ç¥Çö
RUNNER_1ST_002_2, -- ¿¬½Â Âø¼ø 2 '('||RUNNER_1ST_002_2||')' AS RUNNER_1ST_002_2_DESC, -- ¿¬½Â Âø¼ø 2 Ç¥Çö DECODE(R.PAYOFF_002_2,NULL,'-',R.PAYOFF_002_2) PAYOFF_002_2, -- ¿¬½Â 2 DECODE(R.PAYOFF_002_2,NULL,'-',R.PAYOFF_002_2) AS PAYOFF_002_2_DESC, -- ¿¬½Â 2 Ç¥Çö
RUNNER_1ST_004, -- ½Ö½Â Âø¼ø 1 RUNNER_2ND_004, -- ½Ö½Â Âø¼ø 2 '('||RUNNER_1ST_004||'-'||RUNNER_2ND_004||')' AS RUNNER_004_DESC, -- ½Ö½Â Âø¼ø Ç¥Çö DECODE(R.PAYOFF_004,NULL,'-',R.PAYOFF_004) PAYOFF_004, -- ½Ö½Â DECODE(R.PAYOFF_004,NULL,'-',R.PAYOFF_004) AS PAYOFF_004_DESC, -- ½Ö½Â Ç¥Çö
RUNNER_1ST_005, -- º¹½Â Âø¼ø 1 RUNNER_2ND_005, -- º¹½Â Âø¼ø 2 '('||RUNNER_1ST_005||'-'||RUNNER_2ND_005||')' AS RUNNER_005_DESC, -- º¹½Â Âø¼ø Ç¥Çö DECODE(R.PAYOFF_005,NULL,'-',R.PAYOFF_005) PAYOFF_005, -- º¹½Â DECODE(R.PAYOFF_005,NULL,'-',R.PAYOFF_005) AS PAYOFF_005_DESC, -- º¹½Â Ç¥Çö
RUNNER_1ST_006_1, -- »ïº¹½Â Âø¼ø 1-1 RUNNER_2ND_006_1, -- »ïº¹½Â Âø¼ø 1-2 RUNNER_3RD_006_1, -- »ïº¹½Â Âø¼ø 1-3
'('||RUNNER_1ST_006_1||'-'||RUNNER_2ND_006_1||'-'||RUNNER_3RD_006_1||')' AS RUNNER_006_1_DESC, -- »ïº¹½Â 1 Âø¼ø Ç¥Çö DECODE(R.PAYOFF_006_1,NULL,'-',R.PAYOFF_006_1) AS PAYOFF_006_1, -- »ïº¹ 1 DECODE(R.PAYOFF_006_1,NULL,'-',R.PAYOFF_006_1) AS PAYOFF_006_1_DESC, -- »ïº¹ 1 Ç¥Çö
C.TOT, -- °è C.BONGJANG, -- º»Àå C.JIJUM, -- ÁöÁ¡ NVL(B.TOT,0) AS B_TOT, -- ÀüÈ¸Â÷ NVL(Y.TOT,0) AS Y_TOT, -- Àü³â ROUND( CASE WHEN B.TOT>0 THEN (C.TOT-B.TOT)/B.TOT*100 ELSE 0 END ,2) B_PLUS_MINUS, -- Áõ°¨À² ROUND( CASE WHEN Y.TOT>0 THEN (C.TOT-Y.TOT)/Y.TOT*100 ELSE 0 END ,2) AS Y_PLUS_MINUS, -- Àü³â Áõ°¨À² SAME_PAYOFF_TOTAL, -- µ¿Âø Á¸Àç ¿©ºÎ SAME_PAYOFF_001, -- ´Ü½Â µ¿Âø SAME_PAYOFF_002, -- ¿¬½Â µ¿Âø SAME_PAYOFF_004, -- ½Ö½Â µ¿Âø SAME_PAYOFF_005, -- º¹½Â µ¿Âø SAME_PAYOFF_006 -- »ïº¹½Â µ¿Âø FROM ( SELECT D.STND_YEAR, D.MEET_CD, D.TMS, D.DAY_ORD, D.RACE_NO, SUM(D.DIV_TOTAL) TOT,
SUM( CASE WHEN D.MEET_CD='001' AND D.SELL_CD = '01' AND D.COMM_NO IN ('01','02','03','04','08') THEN D.DIV_TOTAL WHEN D.MEET_CD='003' AND D.SELL_CD = '03' AND D.COMM_NO IN ('01','02','03','04','08') THEN D.DIV_TOTAL END ) AS BONGJANG,
SUM(CASE WHEN SELL_CD NOT IN('01','03') OR COMM_NO NOT IN ('01','02','03','04','08') THEN D.DIV_TOTAL END) JIJUM FROM TBES_SDL_DT D WHERE 1=1 AND D.MEET_CD = ? -- 0:MEET_CD °æ·û:001 ,°æÁ¤:003 AND D.STND_YEAR = ? -- 1:STND_YEAR ±âÁØ³âµµ AND D.TMS = ? -- 2:TMS È¸Â÷ AND D.DAY_ORD = ? -- 3:DAY_ORD ÀÏÂ÷ GROUP BY D.STND_YEAR, D.MEET_CD, D.TMS, D.DAY_ORD, D.RACE_NO
)C, ( SELECT D.MEET_CD, D.TMS, D.DAY_ORD, D.RACE_NO, SUM(D.DIV_TOTAL) TOT FROM TBES_SDL_DT D WHERE 1=1 AND D.MEET_CD = ? -- 4:MEET_CD °æ·û:001 ,°æÁ¤:003 AND D.STND_YEAR = ? -- 5:STND_YEAR ±âÁØ³âµµ AND D.TMS = ? -1 -- 6:TMS È¸Â÷ AND D.DAY_ORD = ? -- 7:DAY_ORD ÀÏÂ÷ GROUP BY D.MEET_CD, D.TMS, D.DAY_ORD, D.RACE_NO )B, ( SELECT D.MEET_CD, D.TMS, D.DAY_ORD, DECODE(D.RACE_NO,NULL,'TOTAL',D.RACE_NO) RACE_NO, SUM(D.DIV_TOTAL) TOT FROM TBES_SDL_DT D WHERE 1=1 AND D.MEET_CD = ? -- 8:MEET_CD °æ·û:001 ,°æÁ¤:003 AND D.STND_YEAR = ? -1 -- 9:STND_YEAR ±âÁØ³âµµ AND D.TMS = ? -- 10:TMS È¸Â÷ AND D.DAY_ORD = ? -- 11:DAY_ORD ÀÏÂ÷ GROUP BY D.MEET_CD, D.TMS, D.DAY_ORD, D.RACE_NO ) Y, ( SELECT DECODE(RACE_NO,NULL,'TOTAL',RACE_NO) RACE_NO,

FROM TBES_SDL_RS WHERE 1=1 AND MEET_CD = ? -- 12:MEET_CD °æ·û:001 ,°æÁ¤:003 AND STND_YEAR = ? -- 13:STND_YEAR ±âÁØ³âµµ AND TMS = ? -- 14:TMS È¸Â÷ AND DAY_ORD = ? -- 15:DAY_ORD ÀÏÂ÷ GROUP BY RACE_NO -- ROLLUP(RACE_NO) -- ÃÖÁ¾ ·¹ÄÚµåÀÇ TOTAL, SUM »ý¼º¿ë ) R WHERE 1=1 AND C.RACE_NO=B.RACE_NO(+) AND C.RACE_NO=Y.RACE_NO(+) AND C.RACE_NO=R.RACE_NO(+) ORDER BY C.RACE_NO

/* rsm2031_from01Today °æÁÖº° ÇöÈ² */ FROM ( SELECT D.STND_YEAR, D.MEET_CD, D.TMS, D.DAY_ORD, DECODE(D.RACE_NO,NULL,'TOTAL',D.RACE_NO) RACE_NO, SUM(D.DIV_TOTAL) TOT,
SUM( CASE WHEN D.MEET_CD='001' AND D.SELL_CD = '01' AND D.COMM_NO IN ('01','02','03','04','08') THEN D.DIV_TOTAL WHEN D.MEET_CD='003' AND D.SELL_CD = '03' AND D.COMM_NO IN ('01','02','03','04','08') THEN D.DIV_TOTAL END ) AS BONGJANG,

ORDER BY D.RACE_NO ) C, ( SELECT D.MEET_CD, D.TMS, D.DAY_ORD, DECODE(D.RACE_NO,NULL,'TOTAL',D.RACE_NO) RACE_NO, SUM(D.DIV_TOTAL) TOT, I.RACE_YOIL FROM TBES_SDL_DT D, VW_SDL_INFO I WHERE 1=1 AND D.MEET_CD = ? -- 4:MEET_CD °æ·û:001 ,°æÁ¤:003 AND D.STND_YEAR = ? -- 5:STND_YEAR ±âÁØ³âµµ AND D.TMS = ? -1 -- 6:TMS È¸Â÷ AND D.MEET_CD = I.MEET_CD AND D.STND_YEAR = I.STND_YEAR AND D.TMS = I.TMS AND D.DAY_ORD = I.DAY_ORD AND I.RACE_YOIL = ? -- 7:RACE_YOIL ¿äÀÏ GROUP BY D.MEET_CD, D.TMS, D.DAY_ORD, D.RACE_NO, I.RACE_YOIL -- ROLLUP(D.RACE_NO) -- ÃÖÁ¾ ·¹ÄÚµåÀÇ TOTAL, SUM »ý¼º¿ë ORDER BY D.RACE_NO ) B, ( SELECT D.MEET_CD, D.TMS, D.DAY_ORD, DECODE(D.RACE_NO,NULL,'TOTAL',D.RACE_NO) RACE_NO, SUM(D.DIV_TOTAL) TOT, I.RACE_YOIL FROM TBES_SDL_DT D, VW_SDL_INFO I WHERE 1=1 AND D.MEET_CD = ? -- 8:MEET_CD °æ·û:001 ,°æÁ¤:003 AND D.STND_YEAR = ?-1 -- 9:STND_YEAR ±âÁØ³âµµ AND D.TMS = ? -- 10:TMS È¸Â÷ AND D.MEET_CD = I.MEET_CD AND D.STND_YEAR = I.STND_YEAR AND D.TMS = I.TMS AND D.DAY_ORD = I.DAY_ORD AND I.RACE_YOIL = ? -- 11:RACE_YOIL ¿äÀÏ GROUP BY D.MEET_CD, D.TMS, D.DAY_ORD, D.RACE_NO, I.RACE_YOIL -- ROLLUP(D.RACE_NO) -- ÃÖÁ¾ ·¹ÄÚµåÀÇ TOTAL, SUM »ý¼º¿ë ORDER BY D.RACE_NO ) Y, ( SELECT DECODE(R.RACE_NO,NULL,'TOTAL',R.RACE_NO) RACE_NO,
AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '001' THEN RUNNER_1ST END) AS RUNNER_1ST_001, -- ´Ü½Â Âø¼ø
AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '002' AND RS_SEQ='1' THEN RUNNER_1ST END) AS RUNNER_1ST_002_1, -- ¿¬½Â Âø¼ø 1 AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '002' AND RS_SEQ='2' THEN RUNNER_1ST END) AS RUNNER_1ST_002_2, -- ¿¬½Â Âø¼ø 2 AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '002' AND RS_SEQ='3' THEN RUNNER_1ST END) AS RUNNER_1ST_002_3, -- ¿¬½Â Âø¼ø 3

AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '005' THEN RUNNER_1ST END) RUNNER_1ST_005, -- º¹½Â Âø¼ø 1 AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '005' THEN RUNNER_2ND END) RUNNER_2ND_005, -- º¹½Â Âø¼ø 2

AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '006' AND RS_SEQ='2' THEN RUNNER_1ST END) RUNNER_1ST_006_2, -- »ïº¹½Â Âø¼ø 2-1 AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '006' AND RS_SEQ='2' THEN RUNNER_2ND END) RUNNER_2ND_006_2, -- »ïº¹½Â Âø¼ø 2-2 AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '006' AND RS_SEQ='2' THEN RUNNER_3RD END) RUNNER_3RD_006_2, -- »ïº¹½Â Âø¼ø 2-3
ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '001' THEN PAYOFF END),2) PAYOFF_001, ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '002' AND RS_SEQ='1' THEN PAYOFF END),2) PAYOFF_002_1, ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '002' AND RS_SEQ='2' THEN PAYOFF END),2) PAYOFF_002_2, ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '002' AND RS_SEQ='3' THEN PAYOFF END),2) PAYOFF_002_3, ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '004' THEN PAYOFF END),2) PAYOFF_004, ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '005' THEN PAYOFF END),2) PAYOFF_005, ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN POOL_CD = '006' THEN PAYOFF END),2) PAYOFF_006_1,
